title: MSI MAG X870E Tomahawk MAX Wifi PZ Review: Project Zero cleans up the cables
description: The MSI X870E Tomahawk MAX Wi-Fi PZ mainboard is designed to offer a sleek, clutter-free setup by positioning all its connections on the board's backside, providing a solid base to build your system around.
